thread.title: Superhero Soirée! Amber Rose and Wiz Khalifa Celebrate Son Sebastian’s 4th Birthday – Dressed as Batman and Batgirl
thread.title_full: Superhero Soirée! Amber Rose and Wiz Khalifa Celebrate Son Sebastian’s 4th Birthday – Dressed as Batman and Batgirl

author: Jen Juneau
title: Superhero Soirée! Amber Rose and Wiz Khalifa Celebrate Son Sebastian’s 4th Birthday – Dressed as Batman and Batgirl
text:
A post shared by Lamar Odom (@lamarodom) on Feb 19, 2017 at 3:44pm PST A post shared by Plus Model✖️Mom✖️Feminist🍒 (@tessholliday) on Feb 19, 2017 at 6:08pm PST 
Khalifa, 29, shared oodles of snaps from the bash on his Instagram account while Rose, 33, chronicled the day’s events in her Instagram stories. 
“We love Sebastian. He’s our beautiful child . He’s super awesome,” Rose said in a speech to the party-goers as she and Khalifa toasted their son. “Happy birthday, pumpkin.” 
Sebastian then has the honor of blowing out the candles on a three-tiered, colorful PJ Masks -themed cake. Kevin Wong A post shared by Amber Rose (@amberrose) on Feb 20, 2017 at 3:20pm PST A post shared by Amber Rose (@amberrose) on Feb 20, 2017 at 11:40am PST A post shared by (@amberrosesnaps) on Feb 19, 2017 at 4:49pm PST 
Aside from digging into his cake — and opening mounds of gifts, of course — Sebastian danced to songs like Pharrell Williams ‘“Happy” and “Watch Me (Whip/Nae Nae),” even serenading the crowd with his too-cute rendition of “Jingle Bell Rock.” Because when it’s your birthday, Christmas songs are allowed even in the off season. 
As evidenced by Rose’s Instagram stories and snaps, the celebration also included balloons, a swing set, a fog machine and appearances from Spider-Man and PJ Masks leader Catboy. Kevin Wong
